description:
Doodle Fit, the best-selling puzzle
game, is finally here! Your task is
simple: fit the given sets of blocks
into given shapes. Drag the blocks
inside and outside in search for the
layout that covers the whole shape. A
level is complete when all blocks have
been used and there's no more space
free in the shape. The game features
over one hundred different levels with
a variety of unique shapes to play
with. There are almost 550 solutions
in total, which means you can enjoy
near unlimited replayability.
name: Doodle Fit
